entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight then light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
